sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And as the leader of my nation, I am addressing President Biden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: You are the leader of the nation, of your great nation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I wish you to be the leader of the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Being the leader of the world means to be the leader of peace.
